name: Embed Roomshare Japan
author: Roomshare Japan

sections.description:
Embed Roomshare Japan enables oembed feature for Japanese classified site Roomshare Japan.

日本のルームシェア掲示板ルームシェア ジャパンの募集投稿をoEmbedで記事内に埋め込みます。

With this plugin, your pasting Roomshare Japan classified post in your blog post/page will be converted to fancy information box with the data from roomshare.jp. (like YouTube and Twitter are done so by WordPress default)

Usage:

Just paste a post URL from Roomshare Japan, for example,

 http://roomshare.jp/en/post/138797

募集投稿のURLを本文中にペーストするだけです。

Roomshare Japan is the most popular roommate matching service in Japan (according to Alexa, Google Trend, etc.). The site supports oembed and that can be used from several oembed library such like jQuery oembed all, now WordPress users can easily introduce the classified posts on their blog.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Simply download the plug-in and manage it in your WordPress Admin panel, under the Settings option.
  2. Unzip the downloaded package and upload the extracted folder into your WordPress plugins folder.
  3. Log into your WordPress admin panel
  4. Go to Plug-ins and Activate it
